body_html:
Hi, I didn't actually solve it, other than moving to a newer computer with the latest version of Linux and a newer gpu. I would recommend if you are trying to use cuda, making sure that it is the appropriate version for your graphics card. I have an nvidia 720 with Ubuntu 14, and had cuda 6.5 operational, but when I tried to use cuda 8 all these problems popped up. Check cuda docs and read very thoroughly about their recommended specs for your gpu. Also make sure you are removing the newer version of cuda before replacing it with the older. Hope that helps! Lee
…

body:
Hi,

I didn't actually solve it, other than moving to a newer computer with the
latest version of Linux and a newer gpu.  I would recommend if you are
trying to use cuda, making sure that it is the appropriate version for your
graphics card.  I have an nvidia 720 with Ubuntu 14, and had cuda 6.5
operational, but when I tried to use cuda 8 all these problems popped up.
Check cuda docs and read very thoroughly about their recommended specs for
your gpu.  Also make sure you are removing the newer version of cuda before
replacing it with the older.  Hope that helps!
Lee
